content:
This information is helpful for anyone involved in a lawsuit that concerns building codes and violations. It explains the role of an expert witness, specifically a building inspector, who can provide an opinion on building regulations and violations. The expert witness should have relevant qualifications and experience in the field to develop a report that can be presented to the court.

The report should ideally be convincing enough so that the opposition will settle out of court. Building inspectors can help determine the liability for any damages and make recommendations for how to remedy the defects. Overall, the information provides a useful overview of the role of an expert witness, particularly for those involved in litigation related to building codes and violations.
